name: Fleet of Foot
description: Innate: Sivir gains  35 − 55 (based on level) bonus movement speed for 2 seconds when she damages an enemy champion with an ability or a basic attack.
descriptions: Innate: Sivir gains  35 − 55 (based on level) bonus movement speed for 2 seconds when she damages an enemy champion with an ability or a basic attack.

name: Boomerang Blade
description: Active: Sivir hurls her crossblade in the target direction. Enemies in its path take physical damage, reduced to 100% − 40% (based on non-champions hit). Upon reaching maximum range the crossblade returns to her, dealing the same damage to enemies on its way back.
descriptions: Active: Sivir hurls her crossblade in the target direction. Enemies in its path take physical damage, reduced to 100% − 40% (based on non-champions hit). Upon reaching maximum range the crossblade returns to her, dealing the same damage to enemies on its way back.
Each unit can be damaged only once per pass.

name: Ricochet
description: Active: Sivir's next 3 basic attacks within 4 seconds bounce to nearby unaffected enemies, dealing them physical damage, until none remain in range.
descriptions: Active: Sivir's next 3 basic attacks within 4 seconds bounce to nearby unaffected enemies, dealing them physical damage, until none remain in range.
If Sivir  critically strikes her target, the bounces do so as well.
Ricochet  resets Sivir's basic attack timer.
Ricochet will bounce to targets regardless of having  sight of them or not.

name: Spell Shield
description: Active: Sivir gains a  spell shield for 1.5 seconds.
descriptions: Active: Sivir gains a  spell shield for 1.5 seconds.
Successfully blocking an ability restores  mana.

name: On the Hunt
description: Passive: Sivir gains  bonus attack speed while  Ricochet is active.
levelings:
Initial Movement Speed:»40 / 45 / 50 / 55 / 60%«Minimum Movement Speed:20 / 22.5 / 25 / 27.5 / 30%
Initial Movement Speed Duration:2 / 2.5 / 3 / 3.5 / 4
descriptions: Passive: Sivir gains  bonus attack speed while  Ricochet is active.
Active: Sivir gains  bonus movement speed for 8 seconds that decays to half of that amount after a few seconds.
Sivir also surrounds herself with an aura rallying all nearby allies, granting them On the Hunt's bonus movement speed buff correspondingly to its remaining duration.
